title: OpenAI announces new board lineup and governance structure
description:
OpenAI has announced a refreshed board of directors and new governance structure following recent turmoil that saw CEO Sam Altman ousted, briefly recruited by Microsoft, and then quickly reinstated at the AI research company. In a statement, OpenAI said Altman will rejoin the board alongside three new independent directors: Sue Desmond-Hellmann, former CEO of the... Read more »

The post OpenAI announces new board lineup and governance structure appeared first on AI News.
